newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - CCU started as hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - CCU started as hold.

text.p: -- Credit Lyonnais said it has started coverage of Chilean brewer Compania Cervecerias Unidas SA with a rating of hold.

-- "We expect a secondary ADR (American Depositary Receipt) issue to raise $175-$200 million which will be used to restructure debt obligations and invest in new capacity and marketing through the company's operations," analyst James Trowbridge wrote in a report.
-- He added, "The company's effort to gain share in new markets while maintaining its share core markets is pressuring margins.
-- "With the dilutive effects of the forthcoming capital increase, we do not forecast significant earnings growth in the next two years."
-- Trowbridge set a 12-month price target of $22 an ADR.
-- The company's ADR was down 1/4 to 19-5/8 on Monday in New York.
